Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.ning.http.client.PerRequestConfig
    Per request properties are set on request directly or via builder. This class will be gone in next major release.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.util.Constants.JAVA_1_1
    This constant is useless since Lucene is on Java 5
    org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.util.Constants.JAVA_1_2
    This constant is useless since Lucene is on Java 5
    org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.util.Constants.JAVA_1_3
    This constant is useless since Lucene is on Java 5
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.util.RamUsageEstimator.estimateRamUsage(Object)
    Don't create instances of this class, instead use the static RamUsageEstimator.sizeOf(Object) method.
    com.ning.http.multipart.Part.getBoundary()
    uses a constant string. Rather use Part.getPartBoundary()
    com.ning.http.client.Realm.getDomain()
    - use getNtlmDomain()
    com.ning.http.client.Realm.RealmBuilder.getDomain()
    com.ning.http.client.AsyncHttpClientConfig.getKeepAlive()
    - Use AsyncHttpClientConfig.getAllowPoolingConnection()
    com.ning.http.client.Request.getLength() 
    com.ning.http.client.Request.getReqType()
    - use getMethod
    org.elasticsearch.common.io.stream.StreamInput.readOptionalUTF()
    use StreamInput.readOptionalString()
    org.elasticsearch.common.io.stream.StreamInput.readUTF()
    use StreamInput.readString()
    org.elasticsearch.common.io.stream.HandlesStreamInput.readUTF()
    com.ning.http.client.RequestBuilder.setBody(InputStream)
    RequestBuilderBase.setBody(BodyGenerator) setBody(new InputStreamBodyGenerator(inputStream))
    com.ning.http.client.Realm.RealmBuilder.setDomain(String)
    com.ning.http.client.AsyncHttpClientConfig.Builder.setKeepAlive(boolean)
    - Use AsyncHttpClientConfig.Builder.setAllowPoolingConnection(boolean)
    org.elasticsearch.common.io.UTF8StreamWriter.setOutputStream(OutputStream)
    Replaced by UTF8StreamWriter.setOutput(OutputStream)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.text(String, Object)
    use QueryBuilders.textQuery(String, Object) instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.textPhrase(String, Object)
    use QueryBuilders.textPhraseQuery(String, Object) instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.textPhrasePrefix(String, Object)
    use QueryBuilders.textPhrasePrefixQuery(String, Object) instead
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.textPhrasePrefixQuery(String, Object)
    Use QueryBuilders.matchPhrasePrefixQuery(String, Object)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.textPhraseQuery(String, Object)
    Use QueryBuilders.matchPhraseQuery(String, Object)
    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilders.textQuery(String, Object)
    Use QueryBuilders.matchQuery(String, Object)
    org.elasticsearch.common.io.stream.StreamOutput.writeOptionalUTF(String)
    org.elasticsearch.common.io.stream.StreamOutput.writeUTF(String)
    use StreamOutput.writeString(String)
    org.elasticsearch.common.io.stream.HandlesStreamOutput.writeUTF(String)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.util.ArrayUtil()
    This constructor was not intended to be public and should not be used. This class contains solely a static utility methods. It will be made private in Lucene 4.0
    org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.util.RamUsageEstimator()
    Don't create instances of this class, instead use the static RamUsageEstimator.sizeOf(Object) method that has no intern checking, too.
    org.elasticsearch.common.lucene.util.RamUsageEstimator(boolean)
    Don't create instances of this class, instead use the static RamUsageEstimator.sizeOf(Object) method.
